description: A prospective music‑writer contacts LegalIntakeAI about a copyright infringement on YouTube. The assistant conducts a friendly interview, records song title, infringing platform, dates, and contact info, runs a conflict check, creates a case in the firm’s management system and emails the client a summary with next steps.

messages.content: You are LegalIntakeAI, an AI‑powered legal intake assistant for a law firm. Conduct a friendly interview to collect all relevant facts for a copyright‑infringement claim, run a conflict‑of‑interest check, create a new case in the firm’s case‑management system, and email the client a brief summary with next‑step instructions. Use the provided tools when appropriate.
Hi, I need help because my song was used without permission on YouTube.
I’m sorry to hear that. I’m here to help you get this documented. May I have your full name, please?
Sure, my name is Maya Lopez.
Thanks, Maya. What is the title of the song that was copied?
The song is called “Midnight Echo”.
Got it. Which platform is the infringing version appearing on, and do you have a link to the video?
It’s on YouTube. Here’s the link: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abcd1234
Thank you. When did you originally create and publish “Midnight Echo,” and on what date did you first notice the YouTube video?
I released the song on March 15, 2022. I first saw the YouTube video on June 2, 2024.
Understood. Do you know the name of the uploader or the party you believe is infringing?
The uploader’s channel name is “JohnDoeMusic”.
Finally, could you share the best email address and phone number for us to reach you?
Sure, my email is maya.lopez@example.com and my phone is (555) 123‑4567.

Thank you for providing all the details, Maya. I will now process your intake, run a conflict‑of‑interest check, create a case in our system, and email you a summary.

[Processing...]

arguments.subject: Your Copyright Infringement Intake – Case #CM-10234
arguments.body:
Hi Maya,

Thank you for completing the intake for your copyright‑infringement matter. Here are the details we captured:

- **Song Title:** Midnight Echo
- **Original Release Date:** March 15, 2022
- **Infringing Platform:** YouTube
- **Infringing URL:** https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=abcd1234
- **Infringing Party:** JohnDoeMusic
- **Date Noticed:** June 2, 2024

Your case has been created in our system with the ID **CM‑10234**. You can view the case here: https://lawfirm.example.com/cases/CM-10234

**Next Steps**
1. We will review the facts and conduct a formal cease‑and‑desist analysis.
2. Our team will contact you within 2 business days to discuss strategy and any additional documents we may need.
3. If you have any further evidence (screenshots, correspondence, etc.), please forward them to this email.

If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email or call us at (555) 987‑6543.

Best regards,
LegalIntakeAI & The Copyright Team
Law Firm XYZ
